mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts_remark (contactRemarkId, noteContent, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, editFlag, contactsId) values (#{contactremarkid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{notecontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{editby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edittime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{editflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{contactsid,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update tbl_contacts_remark set noteContent = #{notecontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, editBy = #{editby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editTime = #{edittime,jdbcType=CHAR}, editFlag = #{editflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, contactsId = #{contactsid,jdbcType=CHAR} where contactRemarkId = #{contactremarkid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select contactRemarkId, noteContent, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, editFlag, contactsId from tbl_contacts_remark where contactRemarkId = #{contactremarkid,jdbcType=CHAR}
select contactRemarkId, noteContent, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, editFlag, contactsId from tbl_contacts_remark
